issue.title: [CF 1518] Shaman Elementals
issue.body:
Need to track Elemental durations. Since they are no longer totems, you can't track them. I think you could just use the same Consecration tracker from Paladins.

 

Also it would be nice to be able to Identify that your Elemental is up. I am currently tracking the CD on their special abilities and would like to show only when my elemental exists. Currently using Unit Exists condition but that also shows when other Shamans summon their Elemental.


> Posted by CurseForge user Yakuzaii | Imported from CurseForge issue #1518 | Raw

comments.body:
Greater Fire Elemental can indeed still be tracked as a totem. The consecration tracker is just the totem icon with a different name. 

You can track if its up in the same way.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

It isn't working for me, I can track my totems with the Totem Mastery talent just fine. I just check all the Totems and leave the field blank. It never has never shown my elemental's duration.

 

When I try to specifically list out the Elementals in the field while leaving all the check boxes on, still nothing happens. "Greater Fire Elemental", "Fire Elemental", "Primal Fire Elemental" none of these have worked for me.

 


> Posted by CurseForge user Yakuzaii

Greater Fire Elemental is the correct input to use - I just tried it and its working great.
